Author: lunaticleg
Text: Don't measure yourself for a while! Also drink a lot of water, that will help with the water retention and sodium a bit

Author: Imnotkeepingon
Text: If it helps in any way maybe avoid weighing yourself for a while? And use measurements as your go-to.  I had to stop weighing myself daily because it caused me to bp badly everytime I saw the numbers fluctuate. So I weigh myself weekly now and take measurements when I feel too tempted to weigh myself at a bad time.
